D

Database - Class in edu.self.silvercalc.database
The single responsibility of the Database class is to receive directions from Middleware to store and retrieve information from the saved file.
Database() - Constructor for class edu.self.silvercalc.database.Database
 
didAddTransactionToRecords() - Method in class edu.self.silvercalc.database.Database
For JUnit assert statement: returns true if a transaction was added to the records.
didDeleteRecord() - Method in class edu.self.silvercalc.database.Database
For JUnit assert statement: returns true if a record was successfully deleted from the records.
didDisplayRecords() - Method in class edu.self.silvercalc.display.DisplayScreenGenerator
For JUnit assert statement: returns true if the records were successfully displayed.
DisplayInterface - Class in edu.self.silvercalc.display
The single responsibility of the DisplayInterface class is to interact with the User to launch the System and talk to the other Display classes for Middleware, thereby maintaining the single-responsibility principle of those classes.
DisplayInterface() - Constructor for class edu.self.silvercalc.display.DisplayInterface
 
DisplayManager - Class in edu.self.silvercalc.display
The single responsibility of the DisplayManager class is to communicate with the other Display classes in order to maintain the single-responsibilty principle.
DisplayManager() - Constructor for class edu.self.silvercalc.display.DisplayManager
 
DisplayScreenGenerator - Class in edu.self.silvercalc.display
The single responsibility of the DisplayScreenGenerator class is to be the GUI of the application.
DisplayScreenGenerator() - Constructor for class edu.self.silvercalc.display.DisplayScreenGenerator
A no-parameter constructor for GUI purposes.

L

launchSystem() - Method in class edu.self.silvercalc.display.DisplayInterface

M

Middleware - Class in edu.self.silvercalc.middleware
The single responsibility of the Middleware class is to communicate with Display and Database and perform calculations/pass data around for them.

removeRecord(DefaultListModel<String>) - Method in class edu.self.silvercalc.database.Database
Refreshes the contents of the saved file if a record is removed.

Retrieves the records from the saved file and return them as a list model.

Initializes and instantiates each of the production classes, assigns their reference variables to each other, and starts the use case.

This test class tests the first use case: displaying records on launch.
